content.body: What do people think the web compatibility story is likely to be for making bound functions no longer have a configurable `.prototype` property? Possible? Incompatible?
content.formatted_body: What do people think the web compatibility story is likely to be for making bound functions no longer have a configurable .prototype property? Possible? Incompatible?

content.body: i don't think i've ever seen code touching the prototype field of a bound function

> <@keith_miller:matrix.org> What do people think the web compatibility story is likely to be for making bound functions no longer have a configurable `.prototype` property? Possible? Incompatible?

I actually have some code relying on that prototype property. Might be able to update.
